game.name: Odyssey of Dremid'ir
game.shortDescription: In the desolate realm of Dremid'ir, abandoned by god-like architects, a fragile world teeters on the edge of oblivion. Unearth secrets in ancient ruins, and navigate lost civilizations in this danger-fraught 2d RPG!
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the desolate realm of Dremid'ir, abandoned by god-like architects, a fragile world teeters on the edge of oblivion. Unearth secrets in ancient ruins, and navigate lost civilizations in this danger-fraught 2d RPG!
